alert.note: Alert for Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 9:25AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Madison, west central Lanier, Lowndes and southeastern Brooks Counties through 1000 AM EDT... At 925 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of I-75 At Exit 16, or 10 miles southwest of Valdosta, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Park, Valdosta, Moody Air Force Base, I-75 At Exit 16, Remerton, Dasher, Naylor, Twin Lakes, Hamburg, Valdosta Regional Airport, Kinderlou, I-75 At Exit 5, Nankin, Empress, Clyattville, Blue Springs and I-75 At Exit 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
